page.shortlink: Alpha Five Printer is not Installed
page.topic: Alpha Five Printer is not Installed
page.description: If you try to generate reports using the Amyuni printer driver and the driver is not installed, you may receive an error message.

important.p: The Amyuni Printer is no longer distributed with Alpha Anywhere starting with version 4.6.2.7 (build 7544).

section.description: The Amyuni printer was distributed as part of the Alpha Anywhere in past releases. The driver was used to generate Reports. If the Amyuni printer is not installed and you attempt to create a report using the Amyuni driver, the report will fail to generate. The missing printer may manifest as an error when you try to create a Report:

figure.alt: Report did not print. Error reported was: 'Alpha Five Printer' (for creating PDF, RTF and HTMl output) is not installed. Re-install Alpha Anywhere Application Server for IIS at line: 31
figure.title: Error message sent from the Report server if the Amyuni printer driver is missing

section.description: In order to resolve this error, you need to change the report generation method used for your Reports to PDF Direct and then re-publish your application.

section.title: Using PDF Direct in Web/Mobile Apps

description.p: On the Web Projects Control Panel, open the Web Project Properties
Find the *[ui:PDF Printing Options]* section on the *[ui:Run-time Properties]*.
Check *[ui:Use direct to PDF]*. This ensures all reports will use the new PDF Direct method.

figure.title: The PDF Printing Options in Web Project Properties
figure.alt: The PDF Printing Options in Web Project Properties

description.p: Click *[ui:OK]* to save your changes, *[test your reports]*, and re-publish your application. If your reports do not generate as expected using PDF Direct, [report it to us].

section.title: Using PDF Direct in Desktop Apps

description.p: On the Control Panel, open the *[ui:View]* menu and select *[ui:Settings]*.
Make sure the *[ui:Value]* dropdown is blank or set to *[ui:No]*.
Click *[ui:OK]* to save your changes. *[Test your reports]* and redistribute your app. If your reports do not generate as expected using PDF Direct, [report it to us].
